column5: I'm hoping guys with sonars can tell me how deep the Moutsberg reservoir is (not including the weeds on the bottom  )  avg and deepest spots.
Not deep at all. Deepest I found was like 8-9'. Most areas are 4-7' if you are away from the shoreline.
Can't be deeper then 10 feet. Most spots I can put my paddle down to the bottom.
This year with this heat you'd probably be hard pressed to find anything over 6'. Water levels are WAY down compared to last year. Still a fun lake until the weeds took over
anybody have pics of Mountsberg?  is it often crowded on weekends?

for pics just google map it.  There is a ton of weed there.  Low water levels.  If your in a boat ( electric only ) it won't be crowded.  If you want to catch snot rockets go there.  Anything else do yourself a favour and find another lake.
Alright thanks guys, that's kinda what I thought. That's perfect for a inflatable with a trolling motor!
There are some near 5lbers largies in there...I might have proof  Pm for pics if you'd like

I used to love mountsberg, now theres garbage everywhere and it stinks! last time I was there 8 out of 10 guys were using live bait! Its ok from a boat because you don't have to put up with these things. I used to really enjoy pike fishing there. My pb pike is still from there
I've heard 8ft deep from multiple people, but havnt brought a sonar on it myself.
